name: Mahou No Princess Minky Momo: Remember Dream
name_original: Mahou No Princess Minky Momo: Remember Dream
description:
Mahou no Princess Minky Momo - Remember Dream

• Genre: adventure
• Players: 1

A game based on the anime of the same name. We play as a girl from the land of dreams, Minky Momo, who has been sent to Earth to make people believe in dreams and miracles again. Each time she helps people, Momo receives a gem. Talking to the characters and playing mini-games will help you collect all the crystals. But look at their magical transformations! It's worth starting the game just for that.
